channel.title: Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NullPointerException error help plz
channel.description:
Hi i was trying to fix teh friends list in project 16 blitz and i replaced playerhandler.java and now i get this error
[code] Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NullPointerException at client.initialize(client.java:14911) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:212) at server.main(server.java:52) [/code]

item.title: Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NullPointerException error help plz
item.dc:creator: @william_1434 william_1434
item.description:
@william_1434 wrote:

but how am i gonna get my friend list to work it loads ok but when i pm someone me and him get dc what do i do

Read full topic

item.title: Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NullPointerException error help plz
item.dc:creator: @Haxor_X Haxor X
item.description:
@Haxor_X wrote:

it actually tells you where the errors are…

…

Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NullPointerException at client.initialize(client.java:14911) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:212) at server.main(server.java:52)

for yours the error is in either…

client.java line-14911
playerhandler.java line-212
server.java line-52…

thats all im gonna say…

@i_ancients_i wrote:

[quote=“william_1434, post:3, topic:111022”][quote author=i ancients i link=topic=158612.msg1489763#msg1489763 date=1181883400]
ok i tell this to everyone, go to compile.bat open with notepad by right clicking,go to edit> select all and delete exit out and save>go to mod tharoks perfect compilier which can be located here>http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,49747.0.html
and you insert that into compile.bat by right clicking edit and copy and pasting the code
[/quote]
no my compiler works fine it just look at this ok
Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API.
Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details.
—P16 Re-Animated by Wolf |-Enabled-| —
Exception in thread “main” java.lang.NullPointerException
at client.initialize(client.java:14911)
at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:212)
at server.main(server.java:52)
see[/quote] what is the problem then? what can’t you do
